message: I think it's fair to start with a 90/10 split.  Let's see what you think.
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky!  Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Take this offer, otherwise inflation will eat into our potential gains.
Let's be reasonable, Bob.  Inflation is hurting us both. I'm offering a 55/45 split in my favor, as I believe this is the best way to maximize what we can both take home.
Alice, we're running out of time! This is my final offer: 52/48, slightly in my favor.  Let's close this deal before inflation eats away any more of our potential winnings.
